properties.name: folderId
properties.label: Folder Id
properties.description: If set, this field contains the folder that this configuration belongs to.

properties.name: title
properties.label: Title
properties.description: Symbolic name for the configuration

properties.name: temporaryDirectoryPath
properties.label: Temporary Directory Path
properties.description: Directory in which temporary files are stored. This directory will be cleaned up when the connection is closed.

properties.name: jumpstation
properties.label: Jumpstation
properties.description: Jumpstation that should be used to reach this host.

properties.name: tmpDeleteOnDisconnect
properties.label: Tmp Delete On Disconnect
properties.description: If true, delete the temporary connection directory when the connection is closed

properties.name: tmpFileCreationRetries
properties.label: Tmp File Creation Retries
properties.description: Number of times Overthere attempts to create a temporary file with a unique name

properties.name: connectionTimeoutMillis
properties.label: Connection Timeout Millis
properties.description: Number of milliseconds Overthere waits for a connection to a remote host to be established

properties.name: protocol
properties.label: Protocol
properties.description: Protocol

properties.name: address
properties.label: Address
properties.description: Address of the host

properties.name: port
properties.label: Port
properties.description: Port on which the SSH server runs

properties.name: username
properties.label: Username
properties.description: Username to connect with

properties.name: password
properties.label: Password
properties.description: Password to use for authentication

properties.name: privateKey
properties.label: Private Key
properties.description: Private key to use for authentication

properties.name: privateKeyFile
properties.label: Private Key File
properties.description: Private key file to use for authentication

properties.name: passphrase
properties.label: Passphrase
properties.description: Optional passphrase for the private key in the private key file

properties.name: allocateDefaultPty
properties.label: Allocate Default Pty
properties.description: If true, a default PTY (dummy:80:24:0:0) is allocated when executing a command

properties.name: allocatePty
properties.label: Allocate Pty
properties.description: Specification for the PTY to be allocated when executing a command. The format is TERM:COLS:ROWS:WIDTH:HEIGHT, e.g. xterm:80:24:0:0

properties.name: interactiveKeyboardAuthRegex
properties.label: Interactive Keyboard Auth Regex
properties.description: Regular expression to look for in keyboard-interactive authentication before sending the password

properties.name: sudoUsername
properties.label: SUDO username
properties.description: Username to sudo to when accessing files or executing commands

properties.name: sudoCommandPrefix
properties.label: Sudo Command Prefix
properties.description: Sudo command to prefix to the original command. The placeholder {0} is replaced with the sudoUsername

properties.name: sudoQuoteCommand
properties.label: Sudo Quote Command
properties.description: If true, the original command is quoted when it is prefixed with sudoCommandPrefix

properties.name: sudoPreserveAttributesOnCopyFromTempFile
properties.label: Sudo Preserve Attributes On Copy From Temp File
properties.description: If true, files are copied from the connection temporary directory using the -p flag to the cp command

properties.name: sudoPreserveAttributesOnCopyToTempFile
properties.label: Sudo Preserve Attributes On Copy To Temp File
properties.description: If true, files are copied to the connection temporary directory using the -p flag to the cp command

properties.name: sudoPasswordPromptRegex
properties.label: Sudo Password Prompt Regex
properties.description: Regular expression to look for in interactive sudo before sending the password

properties.name: sudoOverrideUmask
properties.label: Sudo Override Umask
properties.description: If true, permissions are explicitly changed with chmod -R go+rX after uploading a file or directory

properties.name: suUsername
properties.label: SU username
properties.description: Username to su to when accessing files or executing commands

properties.name: suPassword
properties.label: SU password
properties.description: Password of user to su to when accessing files or executing commands

properties.name: suCommandPrefix
properties.label: Su Command Prefix
properties.description: Su command to prefix to the original command. The placeholder {0} is replaced with the sudoUsername

properties.name: suQuoteCommand
properties.label: Su Quote Command
properties.description: If true, the original command is quoted when it is prefixed with suCommandPrefix

properties.name: suPreserveAttributesOnCopyFromTempFile
properties.label: Su Preserve Attributes On Copy From Temp File
properties.description: If true, files are copied from the connection temporary directory using the -p flag to the cp command

properties.name: suPreserveAttributesOnCopyToTempFile
properties.label: Su Preserve Attributes On Copy To Temp File
properties.description: If true, files are copied to the connection temporary directory using the -p flag to the cp command

properties.name: suPasswordPromptRegex
properties.label: Su Password Prompt Regex
properties.description: Regular expression to look for before sending the password

properties.name: suOverrideUmask
properties.label: Su Override Umask
properties.description: If true, permissions are explicitly changed with chmod -R go+rX after uploading a file or directory

properties.name: os
properties.label: Os
properties.description: Os

properties.name: connectionType
properties.label: Connection Type
properties.description: Type of SSH connection to create.
